growthexperiments-help-panel-tog-help-pa:
[[Special:Preferences]], tab 'Edit'. Allows user to enable and disable experimental Help Panel.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-cta-button-:
Text to display in a button which loads the help panel.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-submit-ques:
Text to display in the button for submitting a question via the help panel.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-editing-hel:
Header for a list of help links in the help panel.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-question-wi:
Header for feature that allows users to post questions to their wiki's help desk.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-back-home:
Text to show on button that takes user to home screen of help panel.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-close:
Text shown on a button to close the help panel.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-home-title:
Title shown at top of help panel.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-postedit-su:
Success message shown after the user has saved a suggested edit. This variant implies that the edit will be visible for the world to see (as opposed to {{msg-mw|growthexperiments-help-panel-postedit-success-message-saved}}). This is used in most cases.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Success message shown after the user has saved a suggested edit.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Success message shown after the user has finished a suggested task without making an edit (this can happen for structured tasks).

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Text shown in message dialog alongside a success message, to tell the user that all image recommendation tasks for the day are complete.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Text shown in message dialog alongside a success message, to tell the user that all section-image recommendation tasks for the day are complete.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Text shown in message dialog alongside a success message, to tell the user that all link recommendation tasks for the day are complete.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-postedit-he:
Header of the box suggesting more edits, shown after the user has saved a suggested edit.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-postedit-su:
Sub-header of the box suggesting more edits, shown after the user has saved an image recommendation task.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Secondary sub-header of the box suggesting more edits, shown after the user has saved an image recommendation task.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Sub-header of the box suggesting more edits, shown after the user has saved a section-image recommendation task. Same as {{msg-mw|growthexperiments-help-panel-postedit-subheader-image-recommendation}}

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Secondary sub-header of the box suggesting more edits, shown after the user has saved a section-image recommendation task.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Sub-header of the box suggesting more edits, shown after the user has saved a link recommendation task. Same as {{msg-mw|growthexperiments-help-panel-postedit-subheader-image-recommendation}}

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Secondary sub-header of the box suggesting more edits, shown after the user has saved a link recommendation task.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Sub-header of the box suggesting more edits, shown after the user has saved a suggested edit.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Sub-header of the box suggesting more edits, shown after the user has finished a suggested task without making an edit (this can happen for structured tasks).

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-postedit-fo:
First menu item in the footer of the box suggesting more edits, shown after the user has saved a suggested edit.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-postedit-su:
Text to show when there are no suggested tasks in the post-edit panel, shown after the user has saved a suggested edit and the Leveling Up feature flag is enabled.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Text to show in title of post-edit panel when there are no suggested tasks,  shown after the user has saved a suggested edit and the Leveling Up feature flag is enabled.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Text to show in title of post-edit panel when there are no suggested tasks, shown after the user has saved a suggested edit and the Leveling Up feature flag is NOT enabled.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Text to show when there are no suggested tasks in the post-edit panel, shown after the user has saved a suggested edit and the Leveling Up feature flag is NOT enabled.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-postedit-tr:
Success message shown after a user has saved a suggested edit.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Text to show in button prompting user to try a new task type after saving a suggested edit.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Text to show in button allowing user to decline trying a new task type after saving a suggested edit.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Header of the component prompting the user to try a new task type.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Label text to show next to a checkbox that allows user to opt-out from seeing this dialog again for the current task type.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-postedit-no:
Heading in the dialog asking a user who has made a non-suggested edit to try using the suggested edits feature.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Text in a dialog to encourage a person who has finished an edit try making a suggested edits.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Text of the button for someone to accept seeing suggested articles to edit.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}

Text of the button to dismiss a dialog asking someone who has just published an edit to try a suggested edit task.

{{doc-growthexperiments-postedit-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-questionrev:
Title shown at top of help panel when a user reviews their question before submitting. Used when the question is posted to the help desk.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}

Title shown at top of help panel when a user reviews their question before submitting. Used when the question is posted to a mentor's talk page.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}

Text to show in the help panel when a user is submitting their question. $1 is a link to the community help desk. $2 is the username of the user submitting the question.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}

Label to show above the are where a user may write a question in the help panel.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}

Label for a checkbox in the help panel where a user decides whether the title of the article they are working on should be included in the header of their help desk question.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-question-su:
Template to use for questions posted to community help desk via the help panel when the article title is not included in the message.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}

Template to use for questions posted to community help desk via the help panel when the article title is included in the message. $1 is a page title.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}

Template to use for questions posted to community help desk from Special:Homepage.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-question-po:
Error to show to user if posting question fails. $1 is a link to the community help desk.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-suggesteded:
Title shown at top of help panel when viewing the suggested edits panel.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-revise-tone:
Label shown for the Revise Tone action in the help panel that lets users reopen the onboarding/quiz.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-suggesteded:
Footer shown when viewing the suggested edits panel on desktop.

{{doc-growthexperiments-help-panel}}

Footer shown when viewing the suggested edits panel on mobile.

The first of a set of six tips explaining how to copyedit an article, as part of the "newcomer tasks" workflow.  Screenshots and translation guide here: https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Growth/Personalized_first_day/Newcomer_tasks/Guidance_translation_guide

{{doc-important|The word "earth" should be deliberately misspelled in the local language because we are demonstrating what a typo looks like.}}

The first of a set of six tips explaining how to update an article with new information, as part of the "newcomer tasks" workflow. Screenshots and translation guide here: https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Growth/Personalized_first_day/Newcomer_tasks/Guidance_translation_guide

An example sentence included as part of an editing guide about how to update an article with new information, showing a sentence with outdated information. The word "will" is marked as "negative" because it indicates the future tense in English. When translating, express that the probe ''will land'' in the future, and put the word (or words) that express the future tense inside the <nowiki><mark></nowiki> tag.

Screenshots and translation guide here: https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Growth/Personalized_first_day/Newcomer_tasks/Guidance_translation_guide
